default_theme.label: Default Theme
default_theme.description: Palette applied to visitors who have not personalised their account.

theme_personalisation_policy.label: Theme Personalisation Policy
theme_personalisation_policy.description: Determines whether members can override palette tokens from the settings page.

profile_privacy.label: Default Profile Privacy
profile_privacy.description: Determines whether new profiles are public or private.

post_custom_types.label: Custom Post Type Availability
post_custom_types.description: Controls whether members can flag posts as custom types.

rich_embed_policy.label: Rich Embed Policy
rich_embed_policy.description: Determines whether detected URLs render as local embeds.

statistics_visibility.label: Post Statistics Visibility
statistics_visibility.description: Controls who can see calculated statistics such as word counts.

collaboration_mode.label: Collaboration Controls
collaboration_mode.description: Specifies if collaborators may edit shared posts.

feature_request_policy.label: Feature Request Submission Policy
feature_request_policy.description: Determines which roles can submit new feature requests from the feed.

feature_request_default_visibility.label: Feature Request Default Visibility
feature_request_default_visibility.description: Sets the baseline visibility for newly created feature requests.

feature_request_statuses.label: Feature Request Statuses
feature_request_statuses.description: Ordered list of statuses available when triaging feature ideas.

feature_request_priorities.label: Feature Request Priorities
feature_request_priorities.description: Defines the selectable priority buckets for feature requests.

notification_channel_defaults.label: Default Notification Channels
notification_channel_defaults.description: Channels queued when posts or settings trigger notifications.

notification_cache_driver.label: Notification Cache Driver
notification_cache_driver.description: Defines how notifications are cached for delivery.

cookie_notice_policy.label: Cookie Notice Policy
cookie_notice_policy.description: Controls whether the cookie banner is informational or required.

upload_limits.label: Upload Limits
upload_limits.description: Maximum number of attachments processed per post.

template_selection_mode.label: Template Selection Mode
template_selection_mode.description: Determines whether members can choose from all templates or curated sets.

role_definitions.admin: Full access to all datasets and settings delegation.
role_definitions.moderator: May assist with collaboration and template curation.
role_definitions.member: Standard participant with profile and posting abilities.
